none: Charles Meyer, New York. Text: "Free Sample Darkest Charles Meyer New York Originator of Exora Rouge. By All First Class Toilet Goods Dealers." Text on reverse: "Exora Rouge: Darkest--Dark--Medium--Light--Natural. Guaranteed harmless, does not contain any injurious or poisonous chemicals, entirely vegetable and not affected by water or perspiration. Established 1868."
